title: Trajectory lens: follow the path
caption_md: A tiny animated illustration of a **trajectory**. On the right, the Lens module runs a real-time version.
question: If a hidden-state trajectory shows abrupt direction changes across layers, what might it indicate?
explanation_md: Sudden turns can correlate with **state-space instability** (e.g., shifting modes). A lens tries to quantify this without labels.
